channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: First of surviving Israeli hostages handed over to Red Cross by Hamas
Pam Bondi Responds To Being Ridiculed On 'Saturday Night Live'
Arthur M. Blank Family Foundation donating $50 million to historically Black Atlanta colleges
Bosnia protesters say Gaza ceasefire is 'just the beginning'
A photo worth a thousand words: Taliban minister with Indian female journalists
Trump warns Russia he may send Ukraine long-range Tomahawks if war doesn't settle
item.description: President Donald Trump is warning Russia that he may send Ukraine long-range Tomahawk missiles if Moscow doesn't settle its war there soon

item.title: Arthur M. Blank Family Foundation donating $50M to Black Atlanta colleges
Asian shares skid after Wall Street tumbles to its worst day since April as China trade woes worsen
item.description: Asian shares have tumbled after escalating trade tensions with China shattered a monthslong calm on Wall Street

item.title: New Jersey declares state of emergency as nor'easter approaches
item.description: A nor'easter is churning up the East Coast, prompting declarations of a state of emergency in New Jersey and parts of New York state

item.title: China's exports to the US sink nearly 30% in September as trade truce unravels with new threats of higher tariffs
item.description: China's exports to the US sink nearly 30% in September as trade truce unravels with new threats of higher tariffs
